title: Streetwear Casual

title: I Love Mohammad
prompt: A full-body portrait of a young man with a slight smile, wearing a white thobe and a white kufi, sitting on a red motorcycle. The motorcycle has a circular headlight and a license plate that reads I LOVE MOHAMMAD in English and Arabic. The man is looking directly at the viewer. In the background, out of focus, are palm trees and an ancient-looking stone archway or building. The lighting is bright and even, suggesting an outdoor daytime setting,take face from uploaded image , face should be match 100% from uploaded image
